author: Staff Reporter
text:
Four persons were arrested in connection with the murder of a 56-year-old security guard at the Primary Agriculture Cooperative Bank in Paramathi Velur in 2015.

The guard, Duraisamy, was murdered by an unidentified gang that made an attempt to rob the bank in Perunkurichi on December 23, 2015.

On Thursday, a team led by the Deputy Superintendent of Police of Velur Division, Sujatha, and Velagoundampatti Police Inspector Kailasam were involved in a vehicle check on Namakkal Road in Velur

At Bommampatti Junction, they intercepted an omni van. Enquiry with the persons in the van revealed that they had robbed a man of Rs. 700 in Velagoundampatti and were on the run. It was also found that they were involved in the attempted robbery at the cooperative bank in December.

Arrested

The arrested were Karthick (28), Milton alias Ragu (32), Sridhar alias Sridar Krishnamoorthy (28) and Mohammed Irfan Sheik (35). The omni van was also seized. They were produced in the court and lodged in prison.
title: Four arrested on murder charge
